Here’s the official way to get studio-config-v2.2.0_aces-v1.3_ocio-v2.4.ocio:

- Direct download: Open the OpenColorIO-Config-ACES “v2.1.0–v2.2.0” release and grab the asset named studio-config-v2.2.0_aces-v1.3_ocio-v2.4.ocio (an .ocioz archive may also be listed). ([github.com](https://github.com/AcademySoftwareFoundation/OpenColorIO-Config-ACES/releases/tag/v2.1.0-v2.2.0))
- Built-in (no file needed): In any app using OCIO 2.4+, set your config path to:
  ocio://studio-config-v2.2.0_aces-v1.3_ocio-v2.4
  This is the same config, built into OCIO. ([opencolorio.readthedocs.io](https://opencolorio.readthedocs.io/en/latest/releases/ocio_2_4.html?utm_source=openai))

Want me to pull the exact asset URL for a curl/wget command?
